biotools.summary: The ELIHKSIR (Evolutionary Links Inferred for Histidine Kinase Sensors Interacting with Response Regulators) web application offers insights about the probability of protein interaction specificity in two-component systems. The knowledge reported on this website is gained through statistical inference from genomic data.

bioschemas.name: ELIHKSIR
